00036 class Group extends BDDRecord

00062     public function Validate ( $siteTable )
00063         {
00064                 $errors = new Errors ();
00065         
00066                 // login
00067                         if ( empty( $this->row[ TableGroup::TABLE_COLUMN_NAME ] ) )
00068                         {
00069                                 $errors->Add ( new GroupError ( GroupError::GROUP_NAME_EMPTY, 'Please fill in group name.') );
00070                         }
00071         
00072                 // referent IdSite
00073                         if ( ! @in_array( 'TableSiteInterface', class_implements ( $siteTable ) ) )
00074                         {
00075                                 $errors->Add( new BDDError ( BDDError::TABLE_CLASS_INCORRECT , 'Parameter is not a valid instance of BDDTableSite' ) );
00076                         } 
00077                         else
00078                         {
00079                                 if ( ! $siteTable->IdSiteExists( $this->row[ TableSite::TABLE_COLUMN_IDSITE ]  ) )
00080                                 {
00081                                         $errors->Add ( new GroupError ( GroupError::GROUP_IDSITE_INEXISTANT, 'Group does not refer to any site.') );
00082                                 }
00083                         }
00084                         
00085                 // result
00086                 if ( $errors->GetCount() == 0 )
00087                 {
00088                         $this->isValid = true;
00089                         return NULL;            
00090                 }
00091                 
00092                 
00093                 $this->isValid = false;
00094                 return $errors;
00095         } //----- End of Validate
00096 
00097 //---------------------------------------------- Constructors - destructor
00098 
00107     function __construct( BDDRecord $newRec )
00108     {
00109                 parent::__construct( NULL );
00110         
00111                 // initialization
00112                 $this->SetProperty ( TableGroup::TABLE_COLUMN_IDGROUP , '' );
00113                 $this->SetProperty ( TableGroup::TABLE_COLUMN_NAME , '' );
00114                 $this->SetProperty ( TableGroup::TABLE_COLUMN_OVERRIDE , '' );
00115                 $this->SetProperty ( TableGroup::TABLE_COLUMN_IDSITE , '' );
00116 
00117                 if ( $newRec != NULL )
00118                 {
00119                         $obj = (array)( $newRec);
00120                         
00121                         $this->row = array_merge ( $this->row, $obj[chr(0).'*'.chr(0).'row'] );
00122                         // php hack to access protected property $newRec->row
00123                 }
00124                 
00125                 $this->isValid = false;
00126     } //---- End of constructor
00127         
00131     function __destruct( )
00132         {
00133                 parent::__destruct();
00134         } //----- End of Destructor
